documentation.title: Current Time Timestamp
documentation.standard: Don't use current_time() to get a timestamp as it doesn't produce a Unix (UTC) timestamp, but a "WordPress timestamp", i.e. a Unix timestamp with current timezone offset.

code.title: Valid: using time() to get a Unix (UTC) timestamp.
Invalid: using current_time() to get a Unix (UTC) timestamp.
Valid: using current_time() with a non-timestamp format.
Invalid: using current_time() to get a timezone corrected timestamp.
